parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Offset value; negative value offsets in opposite direction

parameters.name: BothDirections
parameters.description: True to offset the sketch entities in both directions, false to not

parameters.name: Chain
parameters.description: True to offset the chain of sketch entities, false if you want only the selected sketch entities offset (see Remarks )

parameters.name: CapEnds
parameters.description: True to cap the bidirectional offset with arcs, false to not

parameters.name: MakeConstruction
parameters.description: True to make the sketch entities construction geometry after offsetting, false to not

parameters.name: AddDimensions
parameters.description: True to include the offset distance in the sketch, false to not

parameters.name: Offset
parameters.description: Offset value; negative value offsets in opposite direction

parameters.name: BothDirections
parameters.description: True to offset the sketch entities in both directions, false to not

parameters.name: Chain
parameters.description: True to offset the chain of sketch entities, false if you want only the selected sketch entities offset (see Remarks )

parameters.name: CapEnds
parameters.description: True to cap the bidirectional offset with arcs, false to not

parameters.name: MakeConstruction
parameters.description: True to make the sketch entities construction geometry after offsetting, false to not

parameters.name: AddDimensions
parameters.description: True to include the offset distance in the sketch, false to not

returns: True if the sketch entities are offset, false if not
remarks: Specifying true to the Chain argument offsets the selected entity and any other entities that belong to the same contour or chain (contiguous geometric entities like edges).
